description: The path follows along the edge of the canyon, skirting between the trees and the rim itself.  Fireflies flit along nearby, their blinkings giving the only cheery aspect to the path.  A faint touch of smoke rises with the breeze that wafts up out of the depths.

The path follows along the edge of the canyon, skirting between the trees and the rim itself.  Birds sweep along nearby, feeding on the bugs that float there.  A faint touch of smoke rises with the breeze that wafts up out of the depths.
title: [The Slope, Canyon Rim]
